nodes.text: The AA20 Marksman bipod was a model of weapon bipod which was produced by Czerka Arms and available in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The bipod cost 100 and could be applied to rifles, blaster carbines and light repeating blasters, stabilizing the weapons if used.
The AA20 Marksman bipod was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2014.
